title: 2011 Census analysis
summary: People aged 65 and over who were in employment at the time of the 2011 Census, highlighting regional and local variations.
metaDescription: This analysis looks at people aged 65 and over who were in employment at the time of the 2011 Census, highlighting regional and local variations. Using data from the ONS Longitudinal Study, a representative 1% sample of the population of England and Wales, it also focuses on the changing employment patterns of this group between the 2001 and 2011 Censuses.
